enb_long_title: Forty-first Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-41)
sentences: In closing, Acting Chair El Gizouli thanked Secretary Christ for all her hard work.
Saudi Arabia said that Christ s experience and knowledge were truly valuable, and wished her the best.
Christ thanked the Acting Chair and all those she had worked with over the years, as well as the UNEP Executive Director for his valuable advice at the beginning of the session.
Acting Chair El Gizouli closed IPCC-41 at 5:57 pm.
